title: T206 For Sale - NEW CARDS + PRICE REDUCTIONS Wed. 5/18!
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: T206 For Sale - NEW CARDS + PRICE REDUCTIONS Wed. 5/18!
posts.post_content:
T206 for sale here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/traeregan/for-sale[/url]
(any without back scans are available by request)

Offers welcome.
Prices are post-paid. PayPal, Money Order, or Check

First come, first serve.
Emails take precedent over PM's.: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Some cards are also marked for trade, but I'm only interested T206 with perfect fronts.

:)
Hi Trae, I will take the Buck Herzog PSA 2 if the back is clean. PM sent... Thanks Ralph

Thanks, Ralph, email sent. It's yours.

Shappe Error + Herzog sold - CollectorFocus page updated.
Card came today, Big thanks to a great guy, Trae u the man!!! Thx Ralph
